meta.title: Complete Artistry Skill Table for Section-Aware Testing

This is the complete skill table for Artistry with all seven tiers from Novice to Mythic.

| Tier | Concrete Abilities | Examples |
|---|---|---|
| **Novice** | Perform â€¢ Busk â€¢ Fake Performance â€¢ Mimic Voice â€¢ Read the Room | Basic performance |
| **Apprentice** | Inspire â€¢ Stagecraft â€¢ Quick Costume Change â€¢ Rumor Seeding â€¢ Craft Symbol | Persuasion and art |
| **Journeyman** | Heartstring â€¢ Impersonate Official â€¢ Stage Fire â€¢ Emotional Carve â€¢ Persuasive Speech | Rallying art |
| **Master** | Command Performance â€¢ Discourse Duel â€¢ Master Forgery (art/relics) â€¢ Anthem â€¢ Stage Blackout | Signature persuasion |
| **Grandmaster** | Crowd Command â€¢ Masterpiece Reveal â€¢ Voice of Authority â€¢ Cultural Meme â€¢ Living Art | City-scale persuasion |
| **Legendary** | Anthem of Nations â€¢ Mass Mirage â€¢ Icon Forge â€¢ Masterstroke â€¢ Legacy Performance | Campaign-scale persuasion |
| **Mythic** | Song of Peace/War â€¢ Culture Rewrite â€¢ Living Myth â€¢ Word that Moves Kings â€¢ Monument Birth | Epoch-shaping art |

This table represents the complete progression system for Artistry skills from basic performance abilities to world-changing artistic mastery.
